forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.
